Name: Balloon Man
About the game: Cool shit game made by a college student developer! Avoid various traps and solve puzzles to help Balloon Man propose to the princess! There are traps, puzzles, and unique bosses to confuse players! There are stages with various concepts such as platforms, boss battles, chases, puzzles, and time machines. Challenge yourself to speedrun and compete with people all over the world!!
